title: Meet The Staff — Palmer Natural Health
cleaned_text: Meet Our Team Dr. Lisa Palmer, DC Advanced Nutrition Response Testing Practitioner & Elite Instructor® Dr. Lisa Palmer, Owner, studied at Palmer College of Chiropractic West in San Jose, CA. Dr. Palmer also studied Sports Medicine at the University of Florida where she was on scholarship to work with the University's NCAA Division 1 Football Team. Not only is she an Advanced Nutrition Response Testing Practitioner, but she is one of only five Elite Instructors in the entire world. Dr. Jason Dean, DC Advanced Nutrition Response Testing Practitioner® Dr. Jason Dean, Owner, studied at Palmer College of Chiropractic Florida. Dr. Dean has worked with and around sports his entire life and is an avid golfer. He loves working with kids and is an Advanced Nutrition Response Testing Practitioner. Sojaila LoPresto, LMT, RCA Advanced Nutrition Response Testing Practitioner® Sojaila LoPresto is originally from Venezuela and has been a Licensed Massage Therapist for over 10 years. She's also an Advanced Nutrition Response Testing Practitioner. Mirly Perugorria, LMT, RCA Nutrition Response Testing Practitioner® Mirly is a graduate of the Florida College for Natural Health and is a Licensed Massage Therapist, Nutrition Response Testing Practitioner as well as a Registered Chiropractic Assistant. Renee Williams, RCA Nutrition Response Testing Practitioner®/Executive Patient Advocate Renee served 22 years in the U.S. Air Force, traveling all over the world. She found Palmer through a seminar and started out as a patient. As she began her program, she also began to realize the effects of the vaccines and exposure to chemicals had on her while in the Air force. Through her program she was able to get much better and became a Quantum Muscle Testing practitioner.
